select bno ,dname ,bsum ,bcause ,btreat ,bcare ,to_char(bdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as bdate ,bfname from d_board
dname like '%${query}%' or bsum like '%${query}%' or bcause like '%${query}%' or btreat like '%${query}%' or bcare like '%${query}%'
order by bno desc

where bno=#{bno}
select syname from d_symptom where dname=(select dname from d_board where bno=#{bno})
